title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Design-Based Research for Developing Fundamental Principles of Mathematical Change Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Within three weeks, learners can explain basic concepts of rate of change, accumulation, and differentiation/integration by applying them to real-world cases (e.g., population growth models)
Learners can write and suggest improvements through five or more feedback sessions including peer error analysis via LMS discussion boards
In final assessments, learners can solve rate of change concept problems with over 80% accuracy and articulate the problem-solving process in mathematical language
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
